channel.title: Security Blue Team Level 1 - Dezible
channel.description: The Blue Team Level 1 or BTL1 certification is provided by Security Blue Team. They have stated on their website: BTL1 is designed to train technical defenders that are capable of defending networks and responding to cyber incidents. Below are some examples of the skills and experience you will gain. They have mentioned 6 broad domains which they provide training in: Security Fundamentals Phishing Analysis Threat Intelligence Digital Forensics SIEM Incident Response

item.title: Mathematics
item.description: Ques: What is the domain and image of a function? Ans: Domain of a function is the set of input values accepted by the function. Image of a function is the set of output values generated by the function
